alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:56PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT STILLWATER...EASTERN WHEATLAND... WEST CENTRAL CARBON...WEST CENTRAL YELLOWSTONE...NORTHWESTERN MUSSELSHELL...GOLDEN VALLEY AND NORTHEASTERN SWEET GRASS COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM MDT... At 1055 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong winds from showers and thunderstorms moving east at 35 mph. The leading edge of the strong winds were along a line extending from 13 miles north of Deadmans Basin Reservoir to 14 miles south of Ryegate to 12 miles southeast of Big Timber. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Ryegate, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Absarokee, Broadview, Lavina, Franklin, Reed Point, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Fishtail, Shawmut, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Molt, Greycliff, and Rapelje. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone
